DOC.brief_summary: To compare the efficacy and safety of Viagra (sildenafil citrate) vs. placebo for the treatment of men with ED and at least 1 prespecified risk factor who do not self identify as having ED.
DOC.brief_title: A Study Of The Safety and Efficacy Of Viagra In Men With Erectile Dysfunction Who Do Not Self Identify.
DOC.criteria: Men who do not identify as having ED with documented ED Men 30 years of age and older At least one prespecified risk factor for ED Subjects currently prescribed, taking and/or likely to be treated with nitrates or nitric oxide donors in any form on either a regular or intermittent basis Subjects with a known history of retinitis pigmentosa.
